abstract: Fears that that Britain’s new Conservative-Liberal Democrat government will “break up the banks and impose a punitive levy on their businesses loomed over the U.K. banking sector this morning,” according to The Guardian.
snippet: Fears that that Britain’s new Conservative-Liberal Democrat government will “break up the banks and impose a punitive levy on their businesses loomed over the U.K. banking sector this morning,” according to The Guardian.
lead_paragraph: What will Britain’s Conservative-Liberal Democrat coalition government mean for the country’s finance industry?

headline.main: Will British Banks Suffer at Hands of Coalition?
